message.raw: The great reworking. PeptideMethods moved to BioLCCC namespace. Global constants standardChromoConditions and standardChemBasis are added. SecondSolvent are removed and should be added in a different manner. ChromoConditions now return const references to maps rather than begin and end iterators. The orders of arguments in peptide methods are charged. The usage of BOOST_FOREACH is extended.
